insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(990, 'Tchg Spec Needs Students', 'EDUC-337', '337', 'This course is designed to provide educators with the understanding of the development of exceptional students and the methods of identifying, diagnosing, and prescribing the activities for teaching such students in regular classrooms. This course in special education satisfies the state?s requirement for Certification and includes the major categories of exceptionality e.g., the learning disabled, the handicapped, the gifted, etc. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(991, 'Elem Teach Exp Extension', 'EDUC-349', '349', null, 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(992, 'Topics in Education', 'EDUC-399', '399', 'This is an opportunity to do independent and individualized study of topics not a part of the regular program offerings or to a degree beyond normal requirements. Students confer with assigned faculty supervisor and may meet in seminar with other independent study participants. 399C Elementary Education 399J Secondary Education Permission of Department Chair is required1 6 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(993, 'Mth & Materials Language Arts, Elem', 'EDUC-440C', '440C', 'This course focuses on the teaching and learning of the English language arts with an emphasis on instructional planning and assessment using current state and national standards. ED 440C concentrates on the language arts processes and practices implemented in the elementary-level curriculum, grades K-6. 2 semester hours', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(994, 'Methods & Materials Teach Language Arts', 'EDUC-440J', '440J', 'This course focuses on the teaching and learning of the English language arts with an emphasis on instructional planning and assessment using current state and national standards. ED 440J concentrates on the issues and pedagogy of teaching the English language arts and literature in secondary-level settings, grades 7-12. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(995, 'Mthds Lang Arts,MID', 'EDUC-440M', '440M', 'This course focuses on the teaching and learning of the English language arts with an emphasis on instructional planning and assessment using current state and national standards. ED 440M concentrates on the language arts processes and practices for middle school settings, grades 4-8, with an emphasis on interdisciplinary connections. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(996, 'Mths/Mats Teaching Math, Elem', 'EDUC-441C', '441C', 'This course deals with methods of teaching mathematics. Materials are examined for their use in diagnosis, remediation and enrichment. ED 441C concentrates on the scope and sequence, as well as appropriate activities, for the elementary level. 2 semester hours', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(997, 'Mth & Materials Tchg Math, Sec', 'EDUC-441J', '441J', 'This course deals with methods of teaching mathematics. Materials are examined for their use in diagnosis, remediation and enrichment. ED 441J concentrates on the content and methodology of mathematics for secondary students. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(998, 'Mthds Math,MIDD', 'EDUC-441M', '441M', 'This course deals with methods of teaching mathematics. Materials are examined for their use in diagnosis, remediation and enrichment. ED 441M concentrates on the appropriate practices for middle school, grades 4-8, with an emphasis upon interdisciplinary connections. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(999, 'M/M Teaching Social Studies Elementary', 'EDUC-442C', '442C', 'This course assists students in developing competencies in unit planning, instructional strategies, and the utilization of diverse materials and technology for teaching the social studies. Students design courses of study that integrate state and national standards; contemporary thinking about the teaching of social studies is stressed. ED 442C concentrates on the activities, planning, and materials for social studies in elementary classrooms. 2 semester hours', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1000, 'M/M Teaching Social Studies Secondary', 'EDUC-442J', '442J', 'This course assists students in developing competencies in unit planning, instructional strategies, and the utilization of diverse materials and technology for teaching the social studies. Students design courses of study that integrate state and national standards; contemporary thinking about the teaching of social studies is stressed. ED 442J concentrates upon appropriate content, planning, and practices for 7-12 classrooms. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1001, 'M/M Teaching Social Studies Middle', 'EDUC-442M', '442M', 'This course assists students in developing competencies in unit planning, instructional strategies, and the utilization of diverse materials and technology for teaching the social studies. Students design courses of study that integrate state and national standards; contemporary thinking about the teaching of social studies is stressed. ED 442M concentrates on the content, practices, and planning appropriate for the middle level, grades 4-8. Interdisciplinary possibilities are examined. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1002, 'M/M Tchg Tchg Science,Elem', 'EDUC-443C', '443C', 'This course introduces teaching approaches, instructional materials, and contemporary thinking about science education. ED 443 C concentrates upon the practices and materials of effective science for elementary level. ED 443 C ? 2 semester hours', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1003, 'Mthds & Materials Science, Sec', 'EDUC-443J', '443J', 'This course introduces teaching approaches, instructional materials, and contemporary thinking about science education. ED 443J concentrates upon the appropriate content and practices for the secondary science curriculum. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1004, 'Methods and Materials in Teaching Scienc', 'EDUC-443M', '443M', 'This course introduces teaching approaches, instructional materials, and contemporary thinking about science education. ED 443 M concentrates upon the appropriate content and practices for the middle grades, 4-8. Interdisciplinary possibilities are examined. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1005, 'M/M Teach Business,Sec', 'EDUC-445', '445', 'This course focuses on various purposes of the business curriculum in a school setting. It examines the range of teaching strategies and materials for classroom practices. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1006, 'M/M Tchg for Lang', 'EDUC-446', '446', 'This course familiarizes the student with the major purposes of the study of foreign language in the schools. It introduces the strategies and classroom activities for effective teaching. It examines appropriate materials for teaching foreign languages. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1007, 'Tchg Engl As Second Lang', 'EDUC-447', '447', 'This course explores the language needs of children who are learning English as a second language. It reviews and explains effective methods and strategies for teaching such students. The most appropriate materials are identified and utilized. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1008, 'Field Experience', 'EDUC-450', '450', 'This course is a structured observation in a public school. The goals of the course are to facilitate the students? awareness of self, of school pupils, and of prospective teachers. Course can serve as an elective for other majors. The number of credits taken should be determined with the student?s advisor. Required prior to student teaching. 1 to 6 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1009, '^Math for Teachers', 'EDUC-499', '499', null, 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1010, 'Rsrch/Report Writing', 'EDUC-500', '500', 'This is an introduction to the research process, to the understanding of published research, and to the application of research findings to education. The course prepares the student to write formal papers and research reports. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1011, 'Differentiated Instruction:blgd Stud Div', 'EDUC-503', '503', 'This course focuses on pedagogy based on the philosophy that each student is a unique learner and that instruction should be provided that meets the needs of diverse students. Methods for addressing the needs of students? diverse strengths, background, experiences, gender, linguistic, and learning styles will be presented. It is recommended that the course will be taken after completion of EDU 564: Education of Students with Exceptionalities. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1012, 'Comp/Intl Educ', 'EDUC-504', '504', 'This is a comparative study of educational policies and practices in selected countries throughout the world. Global problems like peace, social and economic justice, and environmental quality are examined with a view to promoting global awareness in American education. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1013, 'Intercultural Relations', 'EDUC-505', '505', 'This course presents an overview of theories about educational, social and cultural problems of minority culture students, about teacher perceptions and expectations, about parental involvement. The course also critically analyzes policies and practices of multicultural and bilingual education. The thrust of the course is to develop appropriate and non-biased methods of teaching all children. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1014, 'Psyc Found Educ', 'EDUC-509', '509', 'This is concerned with the work of educators in general and teachers in particular. Topics include student characteristics (personality, growth, and development, adjustment, etc.) motivation, learning, measurement and evaluation, objectives, and teaching methods. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1015, 'Statuatory Requirements', 'EDUC-511', '511', 'This course addresses the topic required for Connecticut licensure in teaching, including topics in health and intergroup relations. 1 semester hour', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1016, 'Fund of Neuroscience for Educators', 'EDUC-512X', '512X', 'This course will provide participants the foundations for understanding the cognitive and neurological sciences associated with the processes of learning.  Participants will learn about the brain processes of storing and retrieving information, and will examine how current neuroscience research intersects with effective teaching and learning across content areas.  Topics of study will include the brain\'s memory systems, the impact of emotions of learning, the processes involved in higher order thinking and learning, and issues related to mental development.', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1017, 'Internship', 'EDUC-515', '515', 'In the first semester interns will work under supervision in a learning environment, providing a variety of paraprofessional services to the schools.', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1018, 'Adaptations: From Print to Film', 'EDUC-520', '520', 'This course will examine the source texts and film adaptations of literary works drawn from a variety of print genres, including short stories, fairy tales, novels, nonfiction journalism, and Shakespearean plays.  Each textual source and film is paired with another to provide illuminating case studies of both close and loose adaptations that compare and contrast on a larger scale.', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1019, 'Children\'s Literature', 'EDUC-536C', '536C', 'This surveys books and periodicals emphasizing criteria for selection and evaluation, procedures for establishing a program of literature in the schools, and opportunities to explore the interpretation of literature in the classroom through drama, story telling, book reporting, and choral speaking. Education 536C is focused on children?s literature. 2 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1020, 'Adolescent Lit,sec', 'EDUC-536J', '536J', 'This surveys books and periodicals emphasizing criteria for selection and evaluation, procedures for establishing a program of literature in the schools, and opportunities to explore the interpretation of literature in the classroom through drama, story telling, book reporting, and choral speaking. Education 536J concentrates on adolescent literature. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1021, 'Adolescent Literature, Middle School', 'EDUC-536M', '536M', 'This surveys books and periodicals emphasizing criteria for selection and evaluation, procedures for establishing a program of literature in the schools, and opportunities to explore the interpretation of literature in the classroom through drama, story telling, book reporting, and choral speaking.  Education 536M concentrates on a pre-adolescent literature. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1022, 'Interdisc Teaching,MI', 'EDUC-537', '537', 'This course focuses on the developmental levels of the middle school student, appropriate instructional climates for middle grade classrooms, and interdisciplinary planning across subjects in English, History/Social Studies, Math, and Science. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1023, 'American Culture & Education', 'EDUC-540', '540', 'This course addresses cultural issues related to education. Topics include multicultural issues in America and the interpretation of demography in relation to schooling. The search for national identity and educational alternatives are explored. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1024, 'Classrm Mgt in Teaching Esl', 'EDUC-541', '541', 'This course focuses on classroom management as an effective tool for a positive learning environment.  Planning, implementing, and maintaining maangement procedures are discussed.', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1025, 'Theory & Methods of Teaching Esl', 'EDUC-542', '542', 'This course addresses the foundations of second language learning theory, research, and discourse in educational settings. It also focuses on strategies for teaching dual language instruction with emphasis on a culturally responsive environment and on legal issues as they apply to schooling for English language learners. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1026, 'Second Lang Acquisition', 'EDUC-543', '543', 'This course provides an overview of the major theories of first and second language acquisition. It applies these theories to classroom pedagogy and examines the influences of parents, siblings, and peers, as well as aspects of formal and informal education. It also examines the influence of region, culture, class, and gender on language acquisition; legal and ethical issues relative to language competency are addressed. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1027, 'Engl Lang & Lit TESOL', 'EDUC-545', '545', 'The purpose of this course is to give prospective teachers of English as a Second Language(ESL) a rich knowledge of literature with potential classroom applications for multicultural settings. Selection and analysis of language processes and literature for elementary and secondary-level classrooms are included. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1028, 'Appl Linguistics for Tchrs', 'EDUC-546', '546', 'This course acquaints teachers with the major analytical frameworks in linguistics. It surveys the discipline of linguistics, the study of human languages, contrastive features, and language systems. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1029, 'DSAP Student Teaching', 'EDUC-547', '547', null, 56, 1, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1030, 'Supv/Obvsd Tchng Elem', 'EDUC-548C', '548C', 'This is a full-time field experience in a selected elementary school. This meets requirements of Connecticut\'s TEAM program. PRAXIS I must be passed. Department permission is required. 6 semester hours', 56, 6, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1031, 'Supv/Obsvd Tchg Sec Sch', 'EDUC-548J', '548J', 'This is a full-time field experience in a selected secondary schools. This meets requirements of Connecticut\'s TEAM program. PRAXIS I must be passed. Department permission is required. 6 semester hours', 56, 6, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1032, 'Supv/Obs Tchg Middle Sch', 'EDUC-548M', '548M', 'This is a full-time field experience in a selected middle school. This meets requirements of Connecticut\'s TEAM program. PRAXIS I must be passed. Department permission is required. 6 semester hours', 56, 6, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1033, 'Elem Teach Exp Extension', 'EDUC-549', '549', null, 56, 1, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1034, 'Curriculum Development', 'EDUC-551', '551', 'This is a study and development of models for curriculum design and implementation at all levels of schooling. Emphasis is placed on current research and practice relevant to curriculum design and the planning and monitoring of curriculum plans in educational settings. Such topics as: curriculum assumptions, goals and objectives, knowledge and content, curriculum evaluation, implementation and staff development strategies are examined. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1035, 'Linguistic Assmnt/Eval of ESL', 'EDUC-557', '557', null, 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1036, 'Evaluation of Instructional Outcomes', 'EDUC-558', '558', 'This course gives students an orientation to the topics, issues, and concepts in the field of educational testing and measurement. Topics include methods for evaluating instructional programs, types of instruments for collecting data, and a variety of standardized, criterion-referenced, and performance-based assessments. The construction of teacher-made tests and the interpretation of different types of test scores are included. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1037, 'Human Development', 'EDUC-560', '560', 'This course provides an opportunity for the study of the subject matter of human development, with a concentration upon the uniqueness of the adolescent period. Theoretical models and methods of researching human growth and development including cognition, physical, social, emotional and moral development will be studied. Genetic and environmental influences of human development will be discussed. Implications for classroom instruction in the middle grades will be explored. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1038, 'Human Grwth/Dev', 'EDUC-560M', '560M', 'This course provides an opportunity for the study of the subject matter of human development, with a concentration upon the uniqueness of the adolescent period. Theoretical models and methods of researching human growth and development including cognition, physical, social, emotional and moral development will be studied. Genetic and environmental influences of human development will be discussed. Implications for classroom instruction in the middle grades will be explored. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1039, 'Educating Students With Exceptionalities', 'EDUC-564', '564', 'The focus of this course is placed upon the instructional methods and materials for exceptional students. General management techniques and administrative procedures are considered in light of the student?s special needs in order to identify and work effectively with the major categories of exceptionality, including the learning disabled, the handicapped, and the gifted, etc. Requirements of the 94-142 law are examined. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1040, 'Contemporary Problem Education I', 'EDUC-565', '565', 'This is a study of foundations, issues and contemporary trends in education with their application to teaching in the schools. An effort will be made to encourage teachers to develop an understanding of their own philosophy of education and how it affects their teaching. 3 semester hours', 56, 1, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1041, 'Comtemporary Problems II', 'EDUC-566', '566', 'This independent study fulfills the Final Degree Option for the Master?s degree. Students pursue an individually planned project under advisement of a faculty member. Extensive reading supports the project. May be taken as an extension of ED 500 or ED 565. 3-6 semester hours', 56, 6, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1042, 'Studies in Literacy Research', 'EDUC-568', '568', 'Students will research assigned or self-selected reseach topics in literacy education that are relevant to the work of literacy specialists. This course may be used to fulfill the Final Degree Option of a Masters in Science for the Remedial Reading and Remedial Language Arts Degree or those completing work in other educational courses.', 56, 1, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1043, 'Instruc for English Lang Learn', 'EDUC-570', '570', null, 56, 1, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1044, 'Reading Diagnosis:intervention', 'EDUC-571', '571', 'This course examines the range of problems that cause students difficulties in literacy processes. It examines assessment instruments and strategies for intervention and instruction in Reading and Language Arts. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1045, 'Adv Diagn RLA Difficulties', 'EDUC-572', '572', 'This course is for students interested in working with learners experiencing profound difficulty in reading, writing, and other literacy processes. Students learn strategies for assessing students referred for specific literacy instruction. Both individual and group diagnostic assessments are used. Students learn how to interpret testing results and make recommendations for improvement. Prerequisite: EDUC 571 2 semester hours', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1046, 'Early Childhood Literacy', 'EDUC-573', '573', 'This course concentrates on the theories, instructional applications, and materials for the teaching, learning, and assessment of literacy processes in early childhood and up to grade 2. Topics include emergent literacy, phonological awareness, and phonic knowledge and instruction. 1 semester hour', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1047, 'Early Childhood Literacy', 'EDUC-573B', '573B', 'Participants will learn how to assess and teach the objectives in the Reading: Foundational Skills module of the English Language Arts Common Core State Standards K-12. This  includes concepts of print, phonological awareness, word identification, spelling and fluency. ', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1048, 'Early Childhood Literacy', 'EDUC-573X', '573X', 'This course concentrates on the theories, instructional applications, and materials for the teaching, learning, and assessment of literacy processes in early childhood and up to grade 2. insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1049, 'Developmental Reading, Elementary', 'EDUC-574', '574', 'This course focuses on the theories, instructional applications, and materials for the teaching, learning, and assessment of literacy processes in elementary classrooms. Topics include strategies in word recognition, vocabulary development, and comprehension. The developmental needs of beginning readers are emphasized. 3 semester hours', 56, 3, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1050, 'Reading Content Area,Sec', 'EDUC-575J', '575J', 'This course focuses on the teaching and learning of comprehension and composing processes and strategies for content area disciplines. insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1051, 'Reading Content,Middle', 'EDUC-575M', '575M', 'This course focuses on the teaching and learning of comprehension and composing processes and strategies for content area disciplines. insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1052, 'Dev Reading, Mid', 'EDUC-576', '576', 'This course focuses on the theories, instructional applications, and materials for the teaching, learning, and assessment of reading and related literacy processes in middle grade (4-8) classrooms. 3 semester hours', 56, null, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1058, 'Tech Literacy for Educators', 'EDUC-592', '592', 'Examines strategies for incorporating various technologies into the classroom, as well as an educators\'s lesson and unit plans. 2smhr course', 56, 2, '2021-03-21 08:48:11');

insert into `courses` (`id`, `name`, `name_shorthand`, `number`, `description`, `department_id`, `credits`, `created_at`) VALUES(1060, 'New Technologies for Learning', 'EDUC-594', '594', 'This course covers creation of learning objects, including text, raster/vector graphics, animations, slideshows, conferencing components, and videos for instructional Webs.
